creator: V.S. Limex Broadcast Systems Ltd
descriptionHtml:
With Europe Live TV Free app you can watch streaming TV depend on the country where you are located.

DMCA NOTE: the Europe Live TV Free app only facilitates the diffusion and access to public Europe TV channels, open and free of Europe DTT, does not contain nor ever have pirated content and links that point to third-party sources.

You can watch TV channels via a stable internet connection via WI-FI or 3G/4G mobile network!

Features:
- Fast downloading and easy changing TV channels.
- The video quality is automatically selected according to the speed of the Internet. You can also adjust the quality yourself.
- Handy TV program.


For technical support and suggestions for improving the application, please write to us:
partners@limexltd.com
descriptionShort: Europe Live TV Free - Application for viewing free European TV channels

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Added Support old devices on Android 4.4 and lower

title: Europe Live TV Free

creator: V.S. Limex Broadcast Systems Ltd
descriptionHtml:
With Limex World TV app you can watch Linear/Live TV on smartphones.

DMCA note:
The free Limex World TV application only facilitates the proliferation and access to publicly available worldwide TV channels with which agreements are concluded, does not contain, and never has pirated content and links indicating to third-party sources. The list of TV channels may be different for various countries, depending on the rights granted by TV channels.

You can watch TV channels via a stable Internet connection, via WI-FI or 3G/4G mobile network.


Features:
- Fast download and easy change of TV channels.
- The video quality is automatically selected according to the internet speed. You can also adjust the quality yourself.
- Easy to use TV program.


For technical support and suggestions to improve the application, please email us:
partners@limexltd.com
descriptionShort: Limex World TV - Application for viewing free worldwide TV channels

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Added Support old devices on Android 4.4 and lower

title: Limex World TV

creator: V.S. Limex Broadcast Systems Ltd
descriptionHtml:
Watch free 80+ TV channels from all over the world in LImex World TV app on your smartphone. Internet connection is all you need. Broadcasting in more than 8 languages (watch TV channels in English, Portuguese, Spanish, French, Romanian, Arab, Farsi, and more)

Watch USA TV channels online in English:
- Newsmax TV
- NASA TV
- Law & Crime
- Runway TV
- DSTV
- and more

Watch UK TV channels online in English:
- British Muslim
- Your Time TV
- God TV

Watch Brasilian TV channels online in Portuguese:
- Yeeaah TV
- TV channel Network
- TV Pampa
- ALX TV
- Rede Evangelizar
- and more

Watch German TV channels online in German:
- Die Neue Zeit TV
- Welt der Wunder
- Sophia TV
- and more

Watch Latin Americas TV channels online in Spanish:
- Amordiscos TV
- Milenium TV
- Melodychannel
- Cajamarca TV
- Esperanza TV
- and more

Watch TV channels in other languages:
- ALFAOMEGA (ro)
- MihanTV (fas)
- Sophia TV (it)
- and more

If you want to watch a particular TV channel in Limex World TV, don't hesitate and contact our support team (support@limexltd.com). We would gladly make an unprecedented effort to include the channel in the Limex World TV app.

Use mobile internet or wi-fi to watch Limex World TV.

All TV channels in Limex World TV included on distribution agreement basis. Our team actively holding negotiations to include worldwide TV channels, you can be sure there are a lot of TV channels to come.

Limex World TV team wishes you all the very best. Enjoy your favorite TV shows and be happy!

DMCA note:
The free Limex World TV application only facilitates the delivery and users' access to publicly available worldwide TV channels with which agreements are concluded. Limex World TV app does not contain and never has pirated content and links indicating to third-party sources. The list of the available LIVE TV channels may vary in different countries, depending on the rights granted by TV channels for the specific territories.

For technical support and suggestions to improve the application, please email us:
support@limexltd.com

- Welt der Wunder
- Sophia TV
- and more

Watch Latin Americas TV channels online in Spanish:
- Amordiscos TV
- Milenium TV
- Melodychannel
- Cajamarca TV
- Esperanza TV
- and more

Watch TV channels in other languages:
- ALFAOMEGA (ro)
- MihanTV (fas)
- Sophia TV (it)
- and more

If you want to watch a particular TV channel in Limex World TV, don't hesitate and contact our support team (support@limexltd.com). We would gladly make an unprecedented effort to include the channel in the Limex World TV app.

Use mobile internet or wi-fi to watch Limex World TV.

All TV channels in Limex World TV included on distribution agreement basis. Our team actively holding negotiations to include worldwide TV channels, you can be sure there are a lot of TV channels to come.

Limex World TV team wishes you all the very best. Enjoy your favorite TV shows and be happy!

DMCA note:
The free Limex World TV application only facilitates the delivery and users' access to publicly available worldwide TV channels with which agreements are concluded. Limex World TV app does not contain and never has pirated content and links indicating to third-party sources. The list of the available LIVE TV channels may vary in different countries, depending on the rights granted by TV channels for the specific territories.

For technical support and suggestions to improve the application, please email us:
support@limexltd.com

descriptionShort: Limex World TV - Application for viewing of worldwide LIVE TV channels
title: Limex World TV

creator: V.S. Limex Broadcast Systems Ltd
descriptionHtml:
Discover the world of free TV with Limex World TV! Watch over 80 live channels from across the globe in HD quality directly on your smartphone. Enjoy news, movies, TV shows, music, sports, and more — all online and completely free.

📺 Why Choose Limex?
• Live streaming of your favorite channels without registration.
• Content in 8+ languages, including English, Portuguese, Spanish, French, German, Arabic, Farsi, and more.
• A variety of categories: news, entertainment, series, music, sports, and kids’ programs.

🌍 Top Channels by Region
Explore international TV in one app:
• USA: NASA, Newsmax, Law & Crime, and more.
• UK: Your Time, British Muslim, God.
• Brazil: Rede Evangelizar, Pampa, ALX.
• Germany: Welt der Wunder, Die Neue Zeit.
• Latin America: Amordiscos, Melodychannel, Esperanza.
…and this is just the beginning!

🔍 Easy to Use
Stream live channels online via Wi-Fi or mobile internet. The app is simple to install and lets you start watching with a single tap.

🎯 Benefits of Limex
• Free access to global television.
• No subscriptions or hidden fees.
• Continuous expansion of available local TV channels.

🌟 Entertainment for Everyone
Whether you’re a news enthusiast, a fan of international shows, or looking for kids’ programs, Limex has something for everyone. Stay updated with live news, dive into exciting TV series, or enjoy music and cultural content from around the world. There’s always something new to discover!

💡 Your Favorite Channels, Always Available
Our team is dedicated to making service the most comprehensive streaming app. With regular updates and new contents added frequently, you’ll always have fresh content to enjoy. We work hard to ensure reliable streaming and the best viewing experience possible.

👥 Want to Add Your Favorite Content?
We’re always working to improve our service. Email us at support@limexltd.com, and we’ll do our best to include your channel in the app.

📄 Legal and Reliable Content
All TV channels are provided under official distribution agreements. Availability may vary depending on your region and broadcasting rights.

📩 For Partnerships:
If you’d like to see your channel on our platform, contact us at partners@limexltd.com.

DMCA Notice
The free Limex World TV application only facilitates the delivery and users' access to publicly available worldwide TV channels with which agreements are concluded. App does not contain and never has pirated content and links indicating to third-party sources. The list of the available LIVE TV channels may vary in different countries, depending on the rights granted by TV channels for the specific territories.

⚡ Get Started Today!
Download our app and enjoy your favorite shows, movies, and live broadcasts. With us, the world of television is just a click away!
descriptionShort: Stream live TV channels worldwide. Watch entertainment, news, and shows online
title:
Limex World TV
